member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.GetSystemData
member.summary: Default endpoint - returns a SystemData object.

member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.GetAmbientColor
member.summary: Retrieve the currently set ambient color. Will still return a value if ambient mode is not active.
member.returns: A HTML RGB hex string (#FFFFFF).

member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.SetAmbientColor(System.String)
member.summary: Set the current ambient mode, and set device mode to ambient.
member.param: A HTML-formatted RGB Color (#666666/FFFFFF)
member.returns: The ID of the selected scene available, or -1 if not found.

member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.GetAmbientScene(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Retrieve the ambient scene specified in the query, or current if none is specified. Will still return a value if ambient mode is not active.
member.returns: The current ambient scene.

member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.GetAmbientScenes
member.summary: Retrieve the list of available ambient scenes.
member.returns: An array of ambient scenes.

member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.SetAmbientScene(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the current ambient mode, and set device mode to ambient.
member.param: The ID of the target ambient mode.
member.returns: The ID of the selected scene available, or the current scene if the target scene isn't found.

member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.GetAudioScene
member.summary: Get the currently selected audio scene.

member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.SetAudioScene(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the desired audio scene and set device mode to Audio.
member.param: ID of the target audio scene.

member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.GetAudioScenes
member.summary: Retrieve an array of available audio scenes.

member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.AuthorizeDevice(System.String)
member.summary: Trigger device authorization for the specified device.
member.param: The device Id to try authorizing.
member.returns: True or false representing if the device is authorized.

member.summary: Download a backup of the current database.

member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.Mode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieve or set the current device mode.
member.param: If specified, set the mode to the value.
member.returns: The current device mode.

members.member:
Set a new device mode.
///
Device Modes: Off = 0, Video = 1, Audio = 2, AudioVideo = 4, Ambient = 3, Udp = 5, DreamScreen = 6
The new device mode to set. The newly-set mode.

member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.SysControl(System.String)
member.param: Available commands are "restart", "shutdown", "reboot", and "update". Restart restarts ONLY the glimmr service. Shutdown shuts down the entire machine. Reboot triggers a system reboot. Update will stop Glimmr, update the software, and re-start the service.

member.name: M:Glimmr.Controllers.GlimmrController.UpdateSystem(Glimmr.Models.SystemData)
member.param: A SystemData object.
member.returns: The updated SystemData object.

member.name: T:Glimmr.Enums.DeviceMode
member.summary: The current device mode. Off = 0 Video = 1 Audio = 2 Ambient = 3 AudioVideo = 4 Udp = 5 DreamScreen = 6

member.name: F:Glimmr.Enums.StripMode.Loop
member.summary: Loop colors (strip is divided in half, second half of colors are mirrored).

member.name: F:Glimmr.Enums.StripMode.Single
member.summary: All leds use a single sector.

The object containing the event data.

member.name: T:Glimmr.Models.Extensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for use with and , as well as functions to convert synchronous event handlers to asynchronous event handlers.

member.name: M:Glimmr.Models.Extensions.InvokeAsync``1(Glimmr.Models.AsyncEventHandler{``0},System.Object,``0)
member.summary: Asynchronously invokes an event, dispatching the provided event arguments to all registered handlers.
member.typeparam: The type of the event arguments.
member.param: This event handler.
The object firing the event.
The object containing the event data.
member.returns: A that completes only when all registered handlers complete. A completed task is returned if the event handler is null.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorSource.Ambient.AmbientScene.AnimationTime
member.summary: Amount of time (in milliseconds) between color updates.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorSource.Ambient.AmbientScene.EasingTime
member.summary: How long to ease between colors.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorSource.Ambient.AmbientScene.Id
member.summary: Theme ID. Will be auto-assigned for user defined themes.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorSource.Ambient.AmbientScene.Easing
member.summary: Easing mode. Blend = 0 (Colors fade directly between one another) FadeIn = 1 (Color fades in after being replaced) FadeOut = 2 (Color fades out, is replaced, turns on full) FadeInOut = 3 (Colors fade in/out before being replaced)

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorSource.Ambient.AmbientScene.Mode
member.summary: Animation mode. Linear = 0 (Colors progress normally) Reverse = 1 (Colors progress in reverse direction) Random = 2 (Colors are selected randomly) RandomAll = 3 (One random color for everything) LinearAll = 4 (Colors progress normally, one color for everything)

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorSource.Ambient.AmbientScene.Colors
member.summary: An array of colors used by the scene.

member.name: T:Glimmr.Models.ColorSource.Ambient.AmbientStream.AnimationMode
member.summary: Linear - Each color from the list of colors is assigned to a sector, and the order is incremented by 1 each update Reverse - Same as linear, but the order is decremented each update Random - A random color will be assigned to each sector every update RandomAll - One random color will be selected and applied to all sectors each update LinearAll - One color will be selected and applied to all tiles, with the color incremented each update

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorSource.Audio.AudioScene.RotationLower
member.summary: Overall lower limit to color range (0 - 1) If lower is GEQ higher, will be ignored

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorSource.Audio.AudioScene.RotationUpper
member.summary: Overall upper limit to color range (0 - 1) If lower is GEQ higher, will be ignored

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorSource.Audio.AudioScene.RotationSpeed
member.summary: How many degrees to rotate on each trigger (0 - 1)

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorSource.Audio.AudioScene.RotationThreshold
member.summary: Minimum amplitude to trigger color rotation

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.Adalight.AdalightData.GammaFactor
member.summary: Gamma adjustment factor. You probably don't want to go higher than 3 or so.

member.name: T:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.IColorTargetAgent
member.summary: Keeping with our theme of dynamically instantiating classes based on interface inheritance, we're going to create an interface that devices can use to create a shared "client" that will be held in ControlService. It is up to the device implementing ColorTarget to find the agent on instantiation

member.name: T:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.IColorTargetData
member.summary: Base class for various color target data classes. All color target data MUST have these properties, but will almost certainly implement more. Refer to actual device JSON from /devices for full device structures.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.IColorTargetData.Enable
member.summary: If set, Glimmr will attempt to control this device.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.IColorTargetData.KeyProperties
member.summary: An array of properties that will be auto-filled in the web UI.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.IColorTargetData.LastSeen
member.summary: The last time the device was seen via device discovery.

member.name: T:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.SettingsProperty
member.summary: A class used by the web UI to automagically generate device settings.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.SettingsProperty.Options
member.summary: A string, string dictionary containing title/value pairs to populate a select input.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.SettingsProperty.ValueHint
member.summary: If set, this will be shown beneath the property.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.SettingsProperty.ValueMax
member.summary: Maximum value that can be set for this property.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.SettingsProperty.ValueMin
member.summary: Minimum Value that can be set for this property.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.SettingsProperty.ValueName
member.summary: The property name to set in the device object.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.SettingsProperty.ValueStep
member.summary: Step size for this property. (Only applies to numeric value types)

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.ColorTarget.SettingsProperty.ValueType
member.summary: The control type to create in the web UI. Possible options: text - Standard text input check - A checkbox (toggle) number - A number input (can be limited by valuemax/min/step ledmap - Create a LED map (custom) beamMap - Create a Lifx Beam map sectorLedMap - Create a LED map for WLED that has multiple sections select - standard select, populate the "Options" dictionary to auto-fill sectormap - Create a standard Sector map nanoleaf - Draw nano leaves hue - Draw Hue selection stuff

member.summary: List of devices and their settings.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.IsWindows
member.summary: Whether or not the OS is windows (Auto-set).

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.AutoDisabled
member.summary: If the system is currently auto-disabled due to no input.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.AutoRemoveDevices
member.summary: If enabled, devices will be automatically removed after the specified time.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.AutoUpdate
member.summary: If enabled, Glimmr will automatically update itself daily.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.DefaultSet
member.summary: Set on first-time initialization. Don't change this.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.EnableAutoBrightness
member.summary: If set, wired LED strips will have their brightness automatically adjusted, a la WLED.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.EnableAutoDisable
member.summary: If set, streaming will be automatically stopped when no input is detected.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.EnableLetterBox
member.summary: If set, horizontal black bars will be cropped when detected.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.EnablePillarBox
member.summary: If set, vertical black bars will be cropped when detected.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.SkipDemo
member.summary: If set, rainbow wipe will not be played on application startup.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.SkipTour
member.summary: If set, introduction/tour will not run on UI load.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.UseCenter
member.summary: If set, sectors will also be collected from teh center of the screen, not just the perimeter.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.CamType
member.summary: Type of camera used for capture. 0 = Raspberry pi camera module 1 = USB webcam

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.CaptureMode
member.summary: Currently selected capture mode for video input. Camera = 1 Hdmi = 2 Screen = 3

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.PreviousMode
member.summary: The previous device mode before Auto-disable was activated.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.AudioGain
member.summary: How much to increase input audio volume.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.AudioMin
member.summary: Low cutoff for audio detection, values below this will not be displayed.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.AutoDisableDelay
member.summary: How long to wait (in seconds) before disabling streaming when no input is detected, when auto-disable is active.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.AutoDiscoveryFrequency
member.summary: Delay (in minutes) between execution of auto-discovery.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.AutoUpdateTime
member.summary: How frequently to automatically send updated system data to the UI.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.BaudRate
member.summary: Speed at which to attempt discovering Adalight devices.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.BlackLevel
member.summary: Colors below this brightness will be considered "black". (Max 255)

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.BottomCount
member.summary: Number of LEDs along the bottom of the screen.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.CropBlackLevel
member.summary: Value cropping checks use to determine what is "black" and should be cropped.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.CropDelay
member.summary: The number of frames required for detection before cropping is activated, if enabled.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.DiscoveryTimeout
member.summary: How long to wait before canceling discovery tasks, in seconds.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.HSectors
member.summary: Number of horizontal sectors around the screen

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.LedCount
member.summary: Number of LEDs for the "master grid". This is auto-computed via left/right/top/bottom counts.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.LeftCount
member.summary: Number of LEDs along the left side of the screen.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.LogLevel
member.summary: Level to log the logging at. 0 = debug, 1 = inf

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.OpenRgbPort
member.summary: Port to use for OpenRGB communication. (Default is 6742)

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.PreviewMode
member.summary: Image preview mode for the web UI. 0 = None 1 = LED 2 = Sectors

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.RightCount
member.summary: Number of LEDs along the right side of the screen.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.SectorCount
member.summary: Total number of sectors available. Is auto-computed based on sector counts and whether center sectors are enabled.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.TopCount
member.summary: Number of LEDs along the top of the screen.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.UsbSelection
member.summary: Currently selected USB device for HDMI/camera capture.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.VSectors
member.summary: Number of vertical sectors along the left/right of screen.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.AmbientColor
member.summary: Current ambient color used when AmbientShow is set to "solid".

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.DsIp
member.summary: Target DreamScreen device to receive color data from. (Streaming mode must be set to 0/DreamScreen)

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.OpenRgbIp
member.summary: IP address to use for OpenRGB communication.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.RecDev
member.summary: Name of the selected audio device for audio and audio/video capture.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.TimeZone
member.summary: Time zone to use for automatic updates.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.Version
member.summary: Version string based on current build + github revision.

member.name: P:Glimmr.Models.SystemData.DeviceId
member.summary: A unique device ID based on MAC address, or random if no NIC accessible.

member.summary: Take a n-color list, and convert down to 12 for DS
member.param: The colors from anywhere else
member.returns: 12 colors averaged from those, or something.

member.summary: Return the average of inputted colors

member.summary: Adjust the brightness of a list of colors
member.param: Input colors
A float from 0-1, representing the max percentage brightness can be represented.

member.summary: Determine if config path is local, or docker

member.summary: The device is part of the desktop.

member.summary: The device is removable; it cannot be the primary display.
